articles.author: Georg Szalai
articles.title: ‘Dreaming of Lions’ Is an Absurdist Black Comedy on Euthanasia Inspired by Its Director’s Experiences - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: At the Red Sea Film Fest in Jeddah, Paulo Marinou-Blanco shares how his father's long illness and his own insomnia play into the film with Denise Fraga and João Nunes Monteiro – and his mother's reaction.
articles.content: Greek-Portuguese writer and director Paulo Marinou-Blanco (Empty Hands, Goodnight Irene) screened Dreaming of Lions, his absurdist black comedy film about assisted suicide and euthanasia, in the 10:3… [+4925 chars]
